EmailTemplate.description: Informing the relevant DuPont responsible that a TMLA is almost expired
EmailTemplate.name: TMLA - Expiry Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: TMLA Expiry Notification for {!Qualification__c.Account_Name__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Qualification__c.Owner__c}
This notification is being sent to the DuPont Qualification Owner and Contact Owner regarding the trademark licensing agreement for {!Qualification__c.Account_Name__c} which will expire on {!Qualification__c.End_Date__c}.
Please take necessary action.
Contact your local business licensing coordinator or the coordinator for your region if you have any questions.
All information is available on SFDC: {!Qualification__c.Link}
Best regards,
Global Licensing Team
